item.title: The EDGY - a software engineering project
item.description: TL;DR: you can find the repository here. For the demo, click here. This repository contains a complete platform for an ideal sports center, developed with an AGILE-Scrum based approach in team. You can access the demo here (heroku hosted). This software has been developed in team at the University of Leeds for the COMP2913 module. The team: Diego Calanzone Sam Barnes Joe Jeffcock Artyom Tunelis Georgy Gunkin
